Batalhão Limeirense
LIMEIRA — Estado de São Paulo

Altura: 1,65                                                                  Olhos: castanhos

Côr: Branca                                                                   Bocca: pequena

Cabellos: { Côr: castanhos                                                    Rosto: oval
          { Forma: lisos
                                                                              Nariz: regular
Barba: preta
                                                                              Signaes: cicatriz no
Bigode: não usa
                                                                              pulso esquerdo
![Image: black-and-white portrait photograph of a young man in military uniform with a cap]

Nome: Antonio Franco

Assignatura: a rogo [signature]

Reservista: não


       Presidente da Junta                    Vice Presidente                           Secretario
[signature: José Levy B.]                                                    [signature: Amos Mandetta]

            Prefeito                               Delegado                              Instructor
                                                                              [signature: illegible]

The page contains a centered black-and-white portrait photograph of a young man in military uniform. Printed form fields appear on both left and right sides of the photograph, filled in with handwritten information. At the bottom are signature lines for various officials with some signatures present. Archival reference numbers appear in the upper left (018) and upper right (2.9) corners of the page.
